text: Kema hananana, Israeli kva vahe'mo'za ke ka'a antahigahaze. E'ina hnageta kagra Israeli kva vahe zamavrenka Isipi rankva nete vuta amanage huta asamiho, Ra Anumzana Hibru vahe'mokizmi Anumzamo tagrite eama hu'ne. Hagi muse hugantonanki knare tatrenanketa tagufa zagegnafina ka'ma kopina vuta Ra Anumzatimofontega ofa ome kre sramana vuntamaneno hutma asamiho.
